attributes.action: MP Charles Walker for Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details:
We want a public vote to bring Charles Walker MP in as our next Prime minister  

Please can all wanting to vote on this. Write an email explaining your reasoning. What you have gone through during the lockdown. How you feel it could of been handled better. It’s our country and we no longer have a say in how we want our country governed and more importantly who governs us.
attributes.background: Within the past few years, we have had a lot of Prime Minister resignations, from different parties. Then the new PM is voted in by a minority of people, being those in their own party. I would like to see a general election called when a PM resigns to allow the public to decide on a new PM.
